attributes.action: Remove the rights of any convicted criminal and make prison a place of punishment, NOT rehabilitation.  Stop bothering about overcrowding in prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
rehabilitation simply does not work.  We should be concentrating on punishing these prisoner, providing a place they should not want to go back to, not a comfortable place where most are better off than not being in prison.
So what if prisons are overcrowded, if they don't like it, they shouldn't do the crime
